questions.title: 你介意我在你的房间吸烟吗？
questions.answer: Would you mind if I smoke in your bedroom?

questions.title: 你介意我们临时换下座位吗？
questions.answer: Would you mind if we change our seat provisionally?

questions.title: 你介意我明天和你一起参加聚会吗？
questions.answer: Do you mind if I join you in the party tomorrow?

questions.title: 你介意我们先开一个十分钟的会议吗？
questions.answer: Do you mind if we hold a ten-minute meeting first?

questions.title: 你介意我带领你到达目的地吗？
questions.answer: Would you mind if I show you the way to your destination?

answer.en: Would you mind if I turn down the conditioner?
No, of course not. I'm hot too.

title: ——我打开你的手提包检查一下，行吗？
——当然不介意。

answer.en: Do you mind if I open your handbag and check?

title: ——你介意我跟你穿相同的衣服吗？
——当然不介意啊。

answer.en: Do you mind if I wear the same clothes as yours?
